greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Determinant of the leading n X n submatrix of A083140.
mathematica: d[n_] := Block[{k = n}, Det[ Join[ {Table[2i, {i, 1, k}]}, Table[ Take[ Prime[j]*Select[ Range[1000], GCD[ Prime[k] #, Product[ Prime[i], {i, 1, j - 1}]] == 1 &], k], {j, 2, k}]]]]; Table[ d[n], {n, 1, 15}]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 15 2003
